description: This file defines a class 'PDFKnowledgeBase' that manages PDF documents, including loading, reading, and processing PDFs asynchronously and synchronously. It interacts with PDF reader classes, handles file validation, and supports metadata enrichment.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that manages a knowledge base of PDF documents, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous document loading, with metadata handling and file validation.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Generator property that yields lists of Document objects from PDFs, handling both list and directory paths.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator property that yields lists of Document objects from PDFs, supporting async reading.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a PDF document from a given path, reads it, and processes the documents with optional metadata and flags.

methods.name: aload_document
methods.description: Asynchronously loads a PDF document from a given path, reads it, and processes the documents with optional metadata and flags.

methods.name: _is_valid_pdf
methods.description: Helper method to validate if a given path points to a valid PDF file, considering existence, file type, suffix, and exclusion list.
